master.description: Main development tasks for Vibe Survivors

tasks.title: Create CurseVictoryScene
tasks.description: Create a new Phaser scene that appears after player victory to show curse acquisition
tasks.details:
Create a new scene class called CurseVictoryScene in the scenes directory. The scene should:
- Use curse_bg asset as the background
- Initialize with proper scene management
- Set up containers for UI elements
- Handle scene transitions properly
- Follow the existing scene patterns used in the game
tasks.testStrategy: Test by triggering victory condition and verifying the scene appears with curse_bg background

tasks.title: Implement curse_incant sound on scene entry
tasks.description: Play the curse_incant sound effect when CurseVictoryScene starts
tasks.details:
Add sound playback functionality to CurseVictoryScene:
- Use the existing SoundManager to play 'curse_incant' sound
- Trigger sound in the scene's create() method
- Ensure sound volume respects user settings
- Handle cases where sound assets might not be loaded
tasks.testStrategy: Enter CurseVictoryScene and verify curse_incant sound plays immediately

tasks.title: Add curse_card sprite with fade-in animation
tasks.description: Display curse_card sprite at bottom of screen with fade-in effect
tasks.details:
Implement curse card appearance:
- Position curse_card sprite at bottom center of screen
- Start with alpha=0 (invisible)
- Create fade-in tween animation
- Time the fade-in to occur after curse_incant sound
- Use responsive positioning for different screen sizes
tasks.testStrategy: Verify curse_card appears at bottom and fades in smoothly after sound

tasks.title: Implement card fly-to-UI animation with curse_created sound
tasks.description: Animate curse_card flying to top-right position with sound effect
tasks.details:
Create card flight animation:
- Calculate target position matching curse UI location (top-right)
- Create smooth bezier curve or straight line tween animation
- Play 'curse_created' sound when animation starts
- Card should maintain its scale/appearance during flight
- Animation duration should feel satisfying (~1-2 seconds)
tasks.testStrategy: Verify card flies smoothly to top-right and curse_created sound plays at start of animation

tasks.title: Integrate with curse UI system
tasks.description: Show curse UI or increment counter when card reaches destination
tasks.details:
Handle curse UI updates:
- Check if this is the first curse for the player
- If first curse: make curse UI visible/slide it in
- If not first curse: increment the curse counter number
- Add visual feedback (pulse, glow) when curse is added
- Ensure curse data is persisted to server/storage
- Update curse UI state properly
tasks.testStrategy: Test both first curse (UI appears) and subsequent curses (counter increments)

tasks.title: Add transition delay and return to character select
tasks.description: Wait briefly then transition back to character select menu
tasks.details:
Implement scene exit:
- Add appropriate delay after curse UI update (2-3 seconds)
- Transition smoothly back to character select scene
- Ensure all tweens/animations are cleaned up
- Reset any temporary state
- Follow existing scene transition patterns
tasks.testStrategy: Verify scene waits appropriate time then smoothly returns to character select

tasks.title: Wire CurseVictoryScene into victory flow
tasks.description: Integrate the new scene into the existing victory condition handling
tasks.details:
Connect to existing victory system:
- Modify victory handling code to go to CurseVictoryScene instead of direct VictoryScene
- Ensure scene is properly added to the game's scene list
- Handle proper scene order: GameScene -> CurseVictoryScene -> CharacterSelectScene
- Test with different victory conditions (boss defeat, etc.)
- Ensure multiplayer victory scenarios work correctly
tasks.testStrategy: Achieve victory in game and verify CurseVictoryScene appears before character select
